title: KupaCrypto
author: KupaCrypto
content: My people election na next week and the way things they go , be like this scarcity of new naira notes go affect the election negatively and positively. Positively in the sense say electoral fraud and malpractice go dey reduce, room no go dey for vote buying and corrupt politicians no go fit rig or influence election results but we to gats reason the negative aspects of this scarcity of new naira notes.Negatively the scarcity of new naira notes fit make voters violent on election Day because as e stands Nigerians are hungry and e get waiting oyibo people dey talk say HUNGRY MAN NA ANGRY MAN. And Nigerians fit still leave the election, them fit no come out come vote because na who done eat dey get strength to vote, so this cashless policy na good thing and bad thing too for our country naija.

comments.body: No be small thing oo,many others will be coming out to participate during the election,now that this new money is scarce and the old money na 90_10 like anything can happen ,other participants that is participating will they really have access to have enough money too?? Looking at the angle of what's about playing,our president wants to leave sit ,is this another way of making things hard and scarce for us before he leaves ?? comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Quote from: KupaCrypto on February 18, 2023, 05:56:14 PMPositively in the sense say electoral fraud and malpractice go dey reduce, room no go dey for vote buying and corrupt politicians no go fit rig or influence election results but we to gats reason the negative aspects of this scarcity of new naira notes.Donâ€™t believe everything you read on social media, Iâ€™m surprised how many Nigerians buy this b.s story of redesigning the naira will reduce electoral fraud. Why is there so much drama about this election? Is this the first time we are having a presidential election? Somehow this election has been painted to be one that will cause civil unrest whichever party that wins. In my opinion, I think Buhari, CBN governor and their puppets made billions of naira from this deal, and were only concerned about filling their pockets. The politicians are not affected by this new policy, they were the first to change their old naira notes. Iâ€™m yet to see anyone who can explain to me how this new naira policy will stop electoral fraud.

Right now from wetin I dey see, everybody dey find new note. E get where I enter on Saturday for inside inside village and this shop wey we been wan buy drink for there no dey accept old note or even transfer self and when I asked around, the new note no even dey available to withdraw.As I see that kind thing na just the election dey go through my mind, e mean say if people bring the new note dem fit easily buy people mind oh because true true cash no dey that side. From wetin I dey hear, dem say na politicians dey make the new note no dey in circulation because dem dun buy all from the banks through the bank managers etc. I no believe the story to be true but this na Nigeria and anywhere you see smoke just know say fire they burn there. Rumours dey usually be wetin dey sup.

comments.body: Scarcity of new naira note fit affect election, but another part be say, if they no see money transfer go dey involved and they can do ringing at the particular time without no even count the vote of the people , so for me here is that we should not collecting transfer, and as he be now our leaders don turn our country to a place where you get money you can control everything you want to do,my advice be say make we suffer them and show them that we are the government and choose better person.

comments.body: The APC now done dey fight president buhari because of this policy and we ak know the strategy wey APC they use win election Which is vote buying,Â  and most of this politicians done loot plenty money wey dem wan carry manipulate the electoral process but this naira redesign policy go try stop some of them no be all, if them been get another means then Them no for dey get issues with the president especially APC, Sorry to say but as Peter obi no dey give shishi u no see am come out come criticize the policy because electoral fraud no dey em mind, but this governors wey dey complain dem surely get plans to rig the system .The policy for now dey harsh for every Nigerian but as time goes by these public office holders wey done hip money for their house nai the policy go really affect..and the new naira efcc and CBN go they monitor am closely, The cashless policy to reduce the influence of money to an extent sha.

comments.body: Na true talk you yarn so, OP. In both positive and negative ways, the scarcity go effect the election. While the corruption go dey reduced, it will not hinder the notes from passing under the table.As of today, banks have been receiving cash, and hopefully before the election day, the cash would have been more rampant than now.

comments.author: Silver005
comments.body: Yes oooh it is very possible that the scarcity of the new naira note will definitely affect the election negatively and positively.Negatively: not All who would have gone to the pulling unit to cast their vote will come because, they're some people who didn't register in the state where they are, and have to travel down to the state where they registered to cast their vote but due to the scarcity of Cash they may not bother to vote again because there was no to for them to request for transfer,And there's some who will say, I have been voting and voting and all this leaders are rewarding us with suffering all the time and for that I am not going to vote anyone this time around because I see no benefit of my voting, and he or she will say look at the money I worked and suffered myself to make has been seazed and you want me to go and vote them again never..Positively: the rate of extravagant spending of money is reduced because there's no Cash at the moment and we have a lesser withdrawal limit now, again vote buying will reduce, this time around there was no much sharing of money on campaign ground now, and another one is that it makes everyone to know the value of money and to learn to minimize and economize what you have,....

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: From my own reasoning and plenty super stories we I dey hear for radio, this resigned naria note scarce presently and I see am say some people win use am choke the election. The redesign go help limit vote buying because cash scarce and the cash wey dey outside for all politicians hand,if them release amÂ  once, e no go fit reach one third of Nigerians. Na CBN print cash give to INEC specially to carry do their election waka. I hear say anybody wey dey go vote make e no carry money go election ground. Make we pray say cash scarce so that vote buying no go dey effective,if not it will be hard for us to vote out bad leaders.
